actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prevent deceptive business solicitations by providing that any such solicitation which is designed to resemble a bill or statement of account shall be nonmailable matter.

summary.text: Prohibits the mailing of any business solicitation which resembles a bill or statement of account.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prevent deceptive business solicitations by providing that any such solicitation which is designed to resemble a bill or statement of account shall be nonmailable matter.
